definition: Germany/German/abbr. for 德國|德国[De2 guo2]
Janjaweed (armed Baggara herders used by the Sudanese government against Darfur rebels)

sentences.english: Clearly, Wadeson did’t want her listeners to actually respond.
sentences.chinese: 很显然，威德森不想让她的听众真的来回答她的问题。

sentences.english: Neither was I surprised when the train stopped at Widley, a tiny station a few miles alone the line.
sentences.chinese: 火车开出几英里即在一个小站威德里停了下来。

sentences.english: Neither was I surprised when the train stopped at Widley, a tiny station a few miles along the line.
sentences.chinese: 火车开出几英里即在一个小站威德里停了下来。

sentences.english: The Rivers Tay and Tweed are major salmon fisheries.
sentences.chinese: 泰河与特威德河是苏格兰两个主要的三文鱼渔场。

sentences.english: WEILI spray booth is a purified space isolated from external dust.
sentences.chinese: “威德力”喷漆房是一个隔绝外界粉尘的净化空间。

sentences.english: Studies of the Weddell seal in the laboratory have described the physiological mechanisms.
sentences.chinese: 在实验室里对威德尔海豹生理机制已作过描述。

sentences.english: Seeing this, the myriad demons go away to hide. They all flee, because they are afraid to face such awesome virtue.
sentences.chinese: 他都跑了，不敢面对这种大威德的相。

definition: honored sir (a person of higher status or seniority, or a Buddhist monk)
Nirvana (in Buddhist scripture)/Lord Brahma (the Hindu Creator)
Manes (3rd century AD), Persian prophet and founder of Manichaeism
to greet and usher in (guests, newcomers etc)/(Buddhism) to receive into the Pure Land
Shengzu, temple name of the second Qing emperor, known as the Kangxi Emperor (1654-1722)/cf. 康熙[Kang1 xi1]
time immemorial/origin of the universe/the world
abbr. for 梵教[Fan4 jiao4] Brahmanism/abbr. for Sanskrit 梵語|梵语[Fan4 yu3] or 梵文[Fan4 wen2]/abbr. for 梵蒂岡|梵蒂冈[Fan4 di4 gang1], the Vatican
Lianyun district of Lianyungang city 連雲港市|连云港市[Lian2 yun2 gang3 shi4], Jiangsu
